column4: can someone help me out with cedega, i almost got it, it just gives me an error right at the end
when i try to load a profile in cedega it tells me su: Authentication failure
ubotu says it doesn't work properly with ubuntu.
dont really matter i use all linux partitions now anyway
i don't dual boot myself so i just use samba so that windows can work with my stuff. :)
you have to convert those to ISO. i think a program called binchunk or something like that will work.
ohh i got it now, thnx
apparently, there's a debian package in their repos so it might be in the ubuntu repos too. :)
i've never actually tried using it but at one point, i was wondering the same thing. glad to hear it works. :)
really simple command line prog, works easy

when i was in windows i took everything i owned and put it .bin and .cue, and i had a lan party server, and when someone needed to reinstall a game they could just get it off their real fast download, and they had to use their own keys, but it made it really easy
